jodd.db.oom.sqlgen

Class DbEntitySql

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.db.oom.sqlgen.DbEntitySql

  • public class DbEntitySql
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful DbSqlBuilder generators.

      • from

        public DbSqlBuilder from(java.lang.Object entity)
        Creates 'SELECT all FROM entity' part of the SQL query that can be easily extended. Entity is referred with its simple class name.

      • findForeign

        public DbSqlBuilder findForeign(java.lang.Class entity,
                                java.lang.Object value)
        Creates SELECT criteria for the entity matched by foreign key. Foreign key is created by concatenating foreign table name and column name.

      • increaseColumn

        public DbSqlBuilder increaseColumn(java.lang.Class entity,
                                   java.lang.Object id,
                                   java.lang.String columnRef,

                                   boolean increase)
        Creates UPDATE that increases/decreases column by some delta value.

      • createTableRefName

        protected static java.lang.String createTableRefName(java.lang.Object entity)
        Creates table reference name from entity type. Always appends an underscore to reference name in order to circumvent SQL compatibility issues when entity class name equals to a reserved word.
